Description:
Situated among the tranquil pine forests and lakes of Southern Estonia, the cosy and comfortable Hotel Kubija offers relaxing holidays and natural health treatments.

Guests can enjoy a wide range of classic and natural health and beauty treatments and wellness procedures, with a choice of 5 saunas and four spa baths available in the spa.

The restaurant serves traditional Estonian delicacies as well as international cuisine. In summer you can dine on the restaurants open-air terrace and enjoy the homemade bread and exquisite chocolate truffles, which are the chefs speciality.

Each room is comfortably equipped with many amenities, including free internet access and beautiful views of the forest or the lake.

In the forest near the hotel you will find both a walking track and an illuminated route for skiing or cycling.

Guests can play mini golf and then relax in the sauna. There is a special play room for children and a playground. Staff will help to organise excursions and hikes through the beautiful natural landscape around Hotel Kubija. Renovation work is done from FebruaryJuly 2023. The Clay rooms, the heating system, and the ventilation are under renovation. The property apologises for any inconvenience caused.

Description:
Surrounded by the lakes, hills and forests of the Haanja Nature Reserve, this 400-year-old manor in Southern Estonia was turned into a modern guesthouse with an integrated training and wellness centre.

Rogosi Manor offers traditional Estonian dishes, which you can enjoy in the ambience of the historic manor atmosphere.

The rooms at Rogosi Manor are simply furnished, but with attention to detail, as evidenced by the racks from the manors small carpentry. The rooms have no TVs or radios to let you enjoy a quiet, undisturbed stay.

The original natural landscape of Southern Estonia and the big distance to larger cities make a stay in this historical building from the 17th century something very special.

The surrounding landscape, close to the Latvian and Russian borders, is lightly populated and offers many cultural and natural sights. A unique attraction is the Suur munamägi, at 318 metres the highest mountain in the Baltics. The lakes are ideal for swimming and fishing. There are many hiking and cycling trails in the surrounding area. Cross-country skiing is available in the nearby Haanja ski centre. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Algallika is a cosy guesthouse in an idyllic location in Western Estonias Matsalu National Park, situated directly on the seaside.

 Veskisilla hotel features a 24-hour front desk service and free private parking. Türi Train Station is 2.6 km away.

Description:
Located in a peaceful area, Vao Guesthouse offers accommodation in individually decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The nearest bus stop is 1 km away in Vao.

The rooms and apartments in Vao Guesthouse are elegantly decorated and feature patterned wallpapers. Most come with a private bathroom and a TV. Free wired internet is available.

Guests can use common kitchens and prepare and keep their food there. A breakfast can be pre-ordered at an additional fee.

Bicycles can be rented out on site. The Väin Lake is 8.7 km away and the Vao Manor is 200 metres from the guest house.

Description:
Located in Türi, 200 metres from Lake Türi, the MaaRitza provides suites and wooden cottages, all heated. Each has a TV set and a seating area. Free Wi-Fi and private parking are included.

The accommodation types at the MaaRitza feature a design inspired by traditional motifs. Both suites and cottages have a kitchenette with an electric kettle, kitchenware and microwave. All have a refrigerator. Towels and linens are provided.

The Pärnu River is within 100 metres. St Martins Church, originally built in the 13th century, is 400 metres away. The Türi Railway Station is 1.2 km from the guesthouse.

The MaaRitza rents out canoes and bicycles. It also prepares picnic baskets and packed lunches. A designated barbecue area is on-site.

Description:
Mokko Country offers accommodation in rooms, apartments, and cottages, surrounded by a garden. Located 3 km from Palamuse, it features a pond for swimming and a sauna.

The rooms are located in three separate houses.

At Mokko Country, guests can enjoy a warm drink or relax with a book from the library on the furnished terrace.  The surrounding nature trails can be explored using the hotels rental bikes. A tennis court is also available.

The Mokko serves breakfast on request. There is a laundry room at a surcharge.

Lake Kuremaa is 2 km away. Hotel Mokko Country is 40 km away from Tartu and Peipsi Lake. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
The Kursi Jahiloss Hotel is housed in a 19th-century renovated hunting manor in Kursi, 40 km from Tartu. It offers high-ceiling rooms with wooden floors, free Wi-Fi and a seating area. The property is located 800 metres from the Pedja River and 152 km from Tallinn.

Guests can enjoy horse riding and cycling in the area. Trips with a guide to the Alam-Pedja Nature Reserve can also be arranged.

All rooms at the Jahiloss are spacious and classically furnished. Each comes with either private or shared bathroom facilities and is decorated with Albert Gulks paintings. There is also antique oak furniture.

The Kursi Jahiloss Hotel boasts an on-site restaurant, the Zum Manteuffel, which specialises in traditional dishes. Guests can enjoy their meals in the Yellow Music and Conference Room and the Hunting Hall.

Kursi Jahiloss is located 6 km from the Alam-Pedja Nature Reserve. The Vooremaa region is 24.8 km away.

All en-suite rooms are decorated in classical design and include a flat-screen TV, as well as carpeted or parquet floors. Each room includes a private bathroom fitted with a shower.
